body:
Now that 3.1 was released, I'm back to this. I rebase it and move methods to the Compressors module:

```ruby
# Register compressors
Sprockets::Compressors.register_js_compressor(:closure, Closure::Compiler)
Sprockets::Compressors.register_css_compressor(:yui, YUI::CssCompressor)

# Register a compressors and set as default for fallbacks
Sprockets::Compressors.register_default_js_compressor(:uglifier, Uglifier, :default => true)

# Load compressors constants only when are needed
Sprockets::Compressors.register_js_compressor(:uglifier, 'Uglifier', {:default => true, :require => 'uglifier'})
Sprockets::Compressors.register_css_compressor(:yui, 'YUI::CssCompressor', :require => 'yui/compressor')

# Ask for registered compressors
Sprockets::Compressors.registered_css_compressor(config.assets.css_compressor)
Sprockets::Compressors.registered_js_compressor(:uglifier)
Sprockets::Compressors.registered_js_compressor(:unexistent_compressor)
```
